---
title: "Gender Stereotype Threats and Academic Performance"
description: Research Methods in Meta-Analysis Project
date: 2024-05-03
resources: "."
about: 
  template: solana
  links: 
  - icon: file-earmark-pdf
    text: "Paper"
    href: projects/gender-academic-proj/paper.pdf
---



This project investigates how gender stereotype threats affect academic outcomes using meta-analysis tehcniques in R. Results showed that both affirmative and non-affirmative interventions improved performance compared to no intervention, despite limited data for subgroup analysis.

**Collaborators:** Amor Ai, Sisley Yang, Frank Janicke, Eesha Nagpal, and Camille Chandler
